input.sentences: i 'm in a contest to build the best house out of lego .
if i win | they 'll build me this house in real .
i think i have a pretty good shot to win this .
this is a side view of this house i love it .
this is a top view . i 'm gon na win this !
output.sentences: The contest specified that the winner would demonstrate the ability to make a lego house that most closely resembled a real house.
The real house could be one that was already made, in which case a photo could be provided.
Or it could be based on a plan for a real house, that too could be submitted.
Novel design features, like this multi-level yellow roofing is highly encouraged.
This novel design, which even incorporated a garden on several levels, won and was chosen to be made into a residence by the buyer.
